txt.en: The Lossoth are a distrusting people and will not aid you unless you can earn the favour of their chieftain, Yrjänä.

'We remember this Vanha-väki you speak of, this Laerdan. He came to the Lumi-väki seeking a lost ring. It was a foolish thing, looking for a bauble in these lands. You should not be so foolish.

'The Vanha-väki did not have the favour of Yrjänä and barely escaped with his life from the dangers that we face here. Without the help of the Lumi-väki, you would have no hope of finding your ring, and you will not have the help of the Lumi-väki without the favour of Yrjänä.

'If you wish to gain our chieftain's favour, you must perform three tasks for the Lumi-väki. Only then may you speak with Yrjänä. If you wish to learn of these tasks, speak with me again.'

Jalmari stands inside Sûri-kylä near to the steam-lodge. Emeli stands across from the steam-lodge. Sini stands on the outskirts of Sûri-kylä.\n\nLassi has told you that three tasks must be completed before you may speak with Yrjänä. You should speak with him again if you wish to learn more.
'Welcome, [placeholder] of the South.  You have shown great worth in the eyes of the Lumi-väki and have gained my favour. How may we be of help to you?'
Yrjänä is at the Great Lodge in Sûri-kylä.\n\nNow that you have completed the tasks required of you, you should speak with Yrjänä.
'You have proven yourself to the Lumi-väki!'
Book 13, Chapter 3: Favour of the Chieftain
